column1: Kata Robata////While the omakase is definitely NOT cheap - let me be real: it's $135 per person - it's COMPLETELY worth it for a special night out (lol @ me thinking "hey Ma let's go eat freaking omakase for no specific reason and I'll pay!!!). But hey
column2: I'm happy that my mom enjoyed it so much
column3: which made me enjoy Kata even more than I already did.
